Pre-Game Insights: Angels manager Ron Washington is looking forward to watching Caden Dana and Samuel Aldegheri pitch in their MLB debut.
The Angels are calling up top pitching prospects Caden Dana and Samuel Aldegheri for this weekend's series against the Mariners.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Caden Dana, ranked No. 74 overall, will make his MLB debut on Sunday vs. Mariners.
Samuel Aldegheri, the club's No. 8 prospect, will start Friday's series opener against Seattle.
Aldegheri would be the first Italian-born pitcher in the Major Leagues since Marino Pieretti in 1950.
Others: The Angels selected Caden Dana as a high-schooler in the 11th round of the 2022 Draft out of Don Bosco Preparatory High School in Ramsey, N.J.
Dana was expected to honor his commitment to pitch at Kentucky, but the Angels went over the $125,000 slot and gave him $1.5 million to get him to sign.
